item.description:
MORE GREAT MUSIC!!
Lets meet at the chapel entrance at 5:45 for the chamber music inside, then we can move outside to picnic in the Quad area. Those who do not want to go into the chapel for 6 can meet in the quad area outside the Chapel at 7:00 for the Carillion Music portion of the performance.

Trinity’s Summer Music

Trinity College will host the 61st Annual Plumb Memorial Carillon Concerts and the 36th Annual Chamber Music Series as part of the 2010 Summer Music Series, made possible through the generous support of George Simon '69. The music series, held annually at the College, features performances every Wednesday during the summer, over a nine-week period. The performances are free and open to the public and will be held rain or shine. Attendees are encouraged to bring a picnic.

Chamber concert ~ 6 p.m.
Chamber Music Series: held in the Trinity College Chapel
Flute and Harp
Deborah Boldin, flute
Anna Reinersman, harp

Carillion concert ~ 7 p.m.
Carillon Music Series: held on the Quad abutting the Chapel
Daniel K. Kehoe - Simsbury UMC, Connecticut


*parking available on Summit and Vernon Streets
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance to the Chapel, will wear the black and white scarf
item.name: Trinity’s Summer Music
